Title: The Rocketeer
Writer: Dave Stevens (graphic novel "The Rocketeer"), Danny Bilson (story), Paul De Meo (story), William Dear (story), Danny Bilson (screenplay), Paul De Meo (screenplay)
Actors: Billy Campbell, Jennifer Connelly, Alan Arkin, Timothy Dalton
Plot: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high-flying masked hero.
Production: Touchstone Pictures, Gordon Company, Walt Disney Pictures
